content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at position (-21.5, 28.0)
- Pipe connections between offshore pump and boiler

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)

### Copper cable factory at position(5, 5)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5)
- Assembling machine at position (5, 5) and inserter at position (5, 5) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position (5, 5) to the assembling machine at position (5, 5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to offshore pump
- Ensure there are no placement blockages when attempting to connect pipes. Check the surrounding area for any entities that may obstruct the connection.

### Errors when dealing with electricity groups
- Verify that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network before attempting to connect other entities. If an electricity group is not plugged in, it may cause connection failures.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may occupy the intended tile.
